root.name: Sabrina, the Teenage Witch: Spellbound
root.description: Spellman's latest adventure is quite a doozy. She has miscast a spell and, as a result, has become trapped. It is the players sole mission to free her as you explore the world where magic is reality. The mystic Spell Book contains scriptures that help Sabrina use her magic. However, there is a catch, she must find the missing spell indgredients in order to escape.Sabrina's world, including her school and bedroom, is filled with challenging puzzles and games such as the, "Wheel of Misfortune!" There are many Magic Tools at your disposal. The Truth Sprinkles, Monster Drops, the Time Ball, the Crazy Camera and many more. Fans of the show will be glad to know that the actual voices of Melissa Joan Hart (), Nick Bakay () and many of the show's characters, including , , and even are perfectly translated to video game form. The ABC television show "Sabrina the Teenage Witch" certainly influenced this latest title. Can you "Spell" exciting?
